forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening. A few showers developing late. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 42F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 9C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 49F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
